Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.event

Interface BulkAwareDocumentListener.Simple

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BulkAwareDocumentListener, DocumentListener, java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditorMarkupModelImpl, LightEditPositionWidget, PositionPanel
    Enclosing interface:
    BulkAwareDocumentListener

    public static interface BulkAwareDocumentListener.Simple
extends BulkAwareDocumentListener
    Simple specialization of BulkAwareDocumentListener for the case when the listener doesn't need the details of the changes (offsets and changed text), and is fine with receiving only one notification for changes done in bulk mode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.editor.event.BulkAwareDocumentListener

        BulkAwareDocumentListener.Simple

    • Field Summary
